content: inspired by winter knit adorable mini sweaters mittens and hats to bring festive warmth to your family tree these whimsical items are worked up in 2 shades of patons classic wool worsted practice knit increases decreases and optional duplicate stitch techniques one ball makes 2 sweaters 4 toques and 4 pairs of mittens create them in classic holiday shades or mix it up with modern palettes that match your holiday home materials patons® classic wool worsted™ 3 5 oz/100 g 194 yds/177 m contrast a navy blue 77773 1 ball or 160 yds/146 m contrast b winter white 00201 1 ball or 160 yds/146 m note 1 ball each of contrast a and b will make 2 sweaters 4 toques and 4 pairs of mittens see notes on page 2 for color placement measurements sweater 3½ 9 cm wide mittens 2½ 6 cm long excluding string toque 3 7 5 cm tall including pompom
